thread.title: Yunling

author: Yunling
title: Yunling
text:
I think all of the products from SSENSE and stylists and blogs are all really awesome, totally different with other shopping website like net a porter or sth like that.
Please keep article and collaborate with interesting artists,stylist, love it!!
full inspiration.
Is that possible to improve the UI/UX, the size part information can not provide more details things, like size can be included into one part of filter. can be connected with each other and real time updated. easy for me to check.
Is that possible add once back to stock, email me? I clicked the
unavailable size, then SSENSE got infor me once back to stock?
or maybe sth else, I don't know it is sold out never come back or maybe it will be back later.
Thanks for asking me, love your guys did!!
